name: Mr. Mosquiter
description:
You are a mosquito named Mr. Mosquito, and you want to get back to the river that you wandered off from.  There is an issue though;  Mosquito Eaters are blocking your path and want to eat you. you should be fine if you pay attention and time your moves right(the mosquito eaters are kinda dumb).  Dodge the "M.E's" to make it to the rivers.  There are three levels in this game.  Good luck!

(in order to play the game, it helps to open it up to full screen.  W, A, S, D works the best.  The arrow keys may not work to well).

This is my first jam, hope you like it.
